title: Cold-Eeze Zinc Chewable Gels, Homeopathic Cold Remedy Citrus with Elderberry
description: Shop Zinc Chewable Gels, Homeopathic Cold Remedy Citrus with Elderberry and read reviews at Walgreens. View the latest deals on Cold-Eeze Cough & Sore Throat Relief.
cleaned_text: Zinc Chewable Gels, Homeopathic Cold Remedy Citrus with Elderberry25.0ea Additional perks How would you like to receive this item ? Wellness in a snap1 Description Cold-EEZE is the original and #1 best-selling zinc lozenge brand, that can help shorten the duration of your cold by 42%, when taken at the first sign of symptoms and used as directed. Our proprietary zinc gluconate formula contains 13.3 mg of zinc per chewable gel which also reduces the severity of cold symptoms including cough, sore throat, nasal congestion, post nasal drip, and/or hoarseness. Our Plus Defense chewable gels and lozenges also contain sambucus nigra, rose hips, and echinacea to help promote immune health. Our popular zinc cold remedy chewable gel in citrus with elderberry flavor is great-tasting and is easy to chew, vegan, kosher, and free from artificial colors and preservatives. Our zinc lozenges and non-drowsy. Also try our Zinc Plus Cold + Flu products that can shorten your cold and deliver additional benefits to relieve your cold and flu symptoms including cough, nasal congestion, irritated respiratory tract, and an irritated throat. Shorten your cold with Cold-EEZE. - Shortens Your Cold: The Cold-EEZE clinically tested zinc gluconate formula can shorten the duration of the common cold by 42% when taken at the first sign of symptoms and used as directed - Promotes Immune Health: Each chewable gel contains the active ingredients sambucus nigra, rose hips, and echinacea to promote immune health - Starts Working Immediately: Cold-EEZE zinc chewable gels release zinc ions in the mouth immediately; some scientists believe the release of zinc ions inhibit the cold virus' ability to replicate, shortening the duration of the common cold - All-Natural Homeopathic Cold Chewable Gels: Cold-EEZE Plus Defense chewable gels are deliciously natural, vegan, kosher, and contain no artificial colors or preservatives - #1 Best-Selling Zinc Lozenge Brand*: Cold-EEZE zinc lozenges have been a trusted first line of defense against colds since 1996 and are Pharmacist recommended - For Adults and Children 12 Years+: Reduces the duration of the common cold and the severity of cold symptoms, including cough, sore throat, nasal congestion, post nasal drip, and/or hoarseness Active ingredient is in the official Homeopathic Pharmacopoeia of the United States. Claims based on traditional homeopathic practice, not accepted medical evidence. These statements have not been evaluated by the FDA. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any disease. *Based on unit sales of cold shortening homeopathic zinc lozenges. Adults and children 12 years and over: - Take one lozenge at the onset of symptoms - Dissolve entire lozenge in mouth - Do not chew - Do not swallow whole - Do not eat or drink for 15 minutes after use - Repeat every 2-4 hours as needed until all symptoms subside Adults 18 years and over do not exceed 6 lozenges per day Children 12 to under 18 years do not exceed 4 lozenges per day Children under 12 years ask a doctor before use © Vespyr Brands [Show More](javascript:void(0)) 1 X HPUS (8.8%) (13.2 mg Zinc) (Cold Remedy), Rosa Canina 2 X HPUS (Rose Hips) (1.0%) (Promotes Immune Support), Purpurea 1 HPUS (0.02%) (Promotes Immune Support)Inactive Ingredients: syrup, glycine, natural colors, natural flavors, sucrose Nutrition FactsServing Size 1 Gel ChewServings Per Container Nutritional Information % Daily Value Warnings Do not use for the treatment of influenza or allergies. This product is intended only to reduce the duration of the common cold and its symptoms. Ask a doctor before use if you have: - Diabetes - Multiple sclerosis (MS) - Rheumatoid arthritis (RA) or other auto-immune condition Ask a doctor or pharmacist before use if you are taking minocycline, doxycycline, tetracycline or are on Coumadin (warfarin) therapy. Zinc may inhibit the absorption of these medicines. When using this product do not take on an empty stomach (to avoid possible minor stomach upset). Stop use and ask your doctor if symptoms persist for more than 7 days. If pregnant or breast feeding, ask a healthcare professional before use. Keep out of reach of children. In case of overdose, get medical help or contact a Poison Control Center right away.WARNING: This product can expose you to chemicals including Lead which is [are] known to the State of California to cause birth defects or other reproductive harm. For more information go to www.P65Warnings.ca.gov. Shipping Specifications Not eligible for Ship to Store at this time This product has no shipping restrictions.
